messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content: To restore the NHS to a properly funded, patient-centered health service. To ensure excellent education for our children, supporting local schools and small class sizes across the country. To provide genuinely affordable housing and to crack down on rogue landlords. To tackle air pollution and introduce a national framework for air quality. To work with community groups and residents in the face of HS2.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Restore the NHS to a properly funded, patient-centered health service.
Ensure excellent education for our children, supporting local schools and small class sizes across the country.
Provide genuinely affordable housing and to crack down on rogue landlords.
Tackle air pollution and introduce a national framework for air quality.
Work with community groups and residents in the face of HS2.
